text:
A year ago, there was only one common toilet, bathroom for the whole floor which had up to 28-30 rooms.... But now they have built them both inside every room...
The things here in the supermarkets are a bit costly when compared to other places...
Management and security people are behaving rudely most of the times...
Most of the sightseeing places/time spending common places/most urbanized areas are far from here...
Even though the bus availability is at a decent intervals, It will remain crowded or it will be fully occupied from the bus stop here.(By workers from this dormitory)...
Alcohol consumption permitted areas available... Food courts are also available...
Overall, an average dormitory.

Traffic issue no proper exit way.
Very strict action security.
The Hostel like person.
1 room 12 person but shower 2nos,n toilet 2nos.
6 clock morning lorry.
Need to weak up 4.30 .
All man need to shower n toilet use. How to enough. Water flow also slow.
Room size also no enough.

Parking lot also issue

Most of the Resident saying that the dormitory Management behavior is poor,they aren’t helpful.
Their play ground is clean and people are enjoying that.They should provide hot water service in every floor.people are coming down to 1st floor to collect hot water it’s not a good service for the people who are coming here to recover from COVID-19.
Best place to stay. It has all the amenities needed. But if you are okay with security people's harassment then you should try this place.
One block 13 floor 's,mrt need to follow 975,172 cho chu Kang station.
